title: Craziest Custom Vehicles in the World and the Custom Glass Work Needed For These

img.alt: A custom car at a custom car meet

description: Ever wonder what the craziest custom vehicles in the world are? There are actually quite a number of them that can be found online and most of these, when customized, needed custom glass work done on them. These are often done with the help of an auto glass replacement or repair company.
